contents.text: An example of this abstraction is a sequence of audio segments, the first of which is a recording of the words "The number you have dialed", followed by a Directory Number variable, followed by a recording of the words "is no longer in service".
contents.zh-CHS: 这种抽象的一个例子是音频段序列，第一个是记录“您拨打的号码”，然后是目录号变量，然后是记录“不再使用”字样。

contents.text: - An abstraction that represents a set of audio segments and which is resolved to a single segment by a qualifier. Nesting of these abstractions must be permitted.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一种抽象，表示一组音频段，并通过限定符解析为单个段。必须允许嵌套这些抽象。

contents.text: For example take a set of audio segments recorded in different languages all of which express the semantic concept "The number you have dialed is no longer in service". The set is resolved by a language qualifier. If the qualifier is "French", the set resolves to the French version of this announcement.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，以不同语言录制的一组音频片段为例，所有这些音频片段都表达了语义概念“您拨打的号码不再服务”。该集合由语言限定符解析。如果限定符为“法语”，则集合解析为本公告的法语版本。

contents.text: In the case of a nested abstraction consisting of a set qualified by language at one level and and a set qualified by gender at another level, it would be possible to specify that an announcement be played in French and spoken by a female voice.
contents.zh-CHS: 在嵌套抽象的情况下，由一个级别的语言限定集和另一个级别的性别限定集组成，可以指定用法语播放公告，并由女声讲话。

contents.text: e. Provide two different methods of audio specification:
contents.zh-CHS: e. 提供两种不同的音频规格说明方法：

contents.text: - Direct specification of the audio components to be played by specifying the sequence of segments in the command itself.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过在命令本身中指定片段序列，直接指定要播放的音频组件。

contents.text: - Indirect specification of the audio components to be played by reference to a single identifier that resolves to a provisioned sequence of audio segments.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过引用解析为已提供的音频段序列的单个标识符来间接指定要播放的音频组件。

contents.text: 11.2.8.2. DTMF Collect Module
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.8.2. DTMF采集模块

contents.text: The DTMF Collect Module must support all of the requirements in the Play Module in addition to the following requirements:
contents.zh-CHS: 除以下要求外，DTMF采集模块还必须支持播放模块中的所有要求：

contents.text: a. Be able to provide the following basic operation:
contents.zh-CHS: a. 能够提供以下基本操作：

contents.text: - request an AEG to play an announcement, which may optionally terminated by DTMF, and then collect DTMF
contents.zh-CHS: - 请求AEG播放公告，该公告可选择性地由DTMF终止，然后收集DTMF

contents.text: b. Be able to specify these event collection characteristics:
contents.zh-CHS: b. 能够指定以下事件集合特征：

contents.text: - The number of attempts to give the user to enter a valid DTMF pattern.
contents.zh-CHS: - 尝试让用户输入有效DTMF模式的次数。

contents.text: c. With respect to digit timers, allow the specification of:
contents.zh-CHS: c. 对于数字计时器，允许指定：

contents.text: - Time allowed to enter the first digit.
contents.zh-CHS: - 允许输入第一位数字的时间。

contents.text: - Time allowed for user to enter each digit subsequent to the first digit.
contents.zh-CHS: - 允许用户在第一个数字之后输入每个数字的时间。

contents.text: - Time allowed for user to enter a digit once the maximum expected number of digits has been entered.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一旦输入了预期的最大位数，允许用户输入位数的时间。

contents.text: d. To be able to allow multiple prompt operations DTMF digit collection, voice recording (if supported), and/or speech recognition analysis (if supported) provide the following types of prompts:
contents.zh-CHS: d. 为了能够允许多个提示操作，DTMF数字采集、语音记录（如果支持）和/或语音识别分析（如果支持）提供以下类型的提示：

contents.text: - Initial Prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 初始提示

contents.text: - Reprompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 责备

contents.text: - Error prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 错误提示

contents.text: - Failure announcement
contents.zh-CHS: - 失败公告

contents.text: - Success announcement.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功公告。

contents.text: e. To allow digit pattern matching, allow the specification of:
contents.zh-CHS: e. 要允许数字模式匹配，请允许指定：

contents.text: - maximum number of digits to collect.
contents.zh-CHS: - 要收集的最大位数。

contents.text: - minimum number of digits to collect.
contents.zh-CHS: - 要收集的最小位数。

contents.text: - a digit pattern using a regular expression.
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用正则表达式的数字模式。

contents.text: f. To allow digit buffer control, allow the specification of:
contents.zh-CHS: f. 要允许数字缓冲区控制，请允许指定：

contents.text: - Ability to clear digit buffer prior to playing initial prompt (default is not to clear buffer).
contents.zh-CHS: - 能够在播放初始提示之前清除数字缓冲区（默认情况下不清除缓冲区）。

contents.text: - Default clearing of buffer following playing of un-interruptible announcement segment.
contents.zh-CHS: - 播放不可中断的公告段后默认清除缓冲区。

contents.text: - Default clearing of buffer before playing a re-prompt in response to previous invalid input.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在播放响应先前无效输入的重新提示之前，默认清除缓冲区。

contents.text: g. Provide a method to specify DTMF interruptibility on a per audio segment basis.
contents.zh-CHS: g. 提供一种基于每个音频段指定DTMF可中断性的方法。

contents.text: h. Allow the specification of definable key sequences for DTMF digit collection to:
contents.zh-CHS: h. 允许指定DTMF数字采集的可定义键序列：

contents.text: - Discard collected digits in progress, replay the prompt, and resume DTMF digit collection.
contents.zh-CHS: - 丢弃正在收集的数字，重播提示，然后恢复DTMF数字收集。

contents.text: - Discard collected digits in progress and resume DTMF digit collection.
contents.zh-CHS: - 丢弃正在收集的数字并恢复DTMF数字收集。

contents.text: - Terminate the current operation and return the terminating key sequence to the MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止当前操作并将终止键序列返回给MGC。

contents.text: i. Provide a way to ask the ARF MG to support the following definable keys for digit collection and recording. These keys would then be able to be acted upon by the ARF MG:
contents.zh-CHS: i. 提供一种方法，要求ARF MG支持以下可定义的数字采集和记录键。然后，ARF MG可以对这些键进行操作：

contents.text: - A key to terminate playing of an announcement in progress.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止正在播放的公告的键。

contents.text: - A set of one or more keys that can be accepted as the first digit to be collected.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一组一个或多个键，可作为要收集的第一个数字。

contents.text: - A key that signals the end of user input. The key may or may not be returned to the MGC along with the input already collected.
contents.zh-CHS: - 表示用户输入结束的键。密钥可能会也可能不会与已收集的输入一起返回给MGC。

contents.text: - Keys to stop playing the current announcement and resume playing at the beginning of the first segment of the announcement, last segment of the announcement, previous segment of the announcement, next segment of the announcement, or the current announcement segment.
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止播放当前公告并在公告的第一段、最后一段、上一段、下一段或当前公告段开始时继续播放的按键。

contents.text: 11.2.8.3. Record Audio Module
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.8.3. 录音音频模块

contents.text: The Record Module must support all of the requirements in the Play Module as in addition to the following requirements:
contents.zh-CHS: 除以下要求外，录制模块还必须支持播放模块中的所有要求：

contents.text: a. Be able to provide the following basic operation:
contents.zh-CHS: a. 能够提供以下基本操作：

contents.text: - request an AEG to play an announcement and then record voice.
contents.zh-CHS: - 请求AEG播放公告，然后录制语音。

contents.text: b. Be able to specify these event collection characteristics:
contents.zh-CHS: b. 能够指定以下事件集合特征：

contents.text: - The number of attempts to give the user to make a recording.
contents.zh-CHS: - 尝试让用户进行录制的次数。

contents.text: c. With respect to recording timers, allow the specification of:
contents.zh-CHS: c. 关于记录计时器，允许指定：

contents.text: - Time to wait for the user to initially speak.
contents.zh-CHS: - 等待用户最初发言的时间。

contents.text: - The amount of silence necessary following the last speech segment for the recording to be considered complete.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在最后一段讲话之后，认为录音已完成所需的沉默量。

contents.text: - The maximum allowable length of the recording (not including pre- and post- speech silence).
contents.zh-CHS: - 录音的最大允许长度（不包括演讲前和演讲后的沉默）。

contents.text: d. To be able to allow multiple prompt operations for DTMF digit collection (if supported), voice recording (if supported), speech recognition analysis (if supported) and/or speech verification/identification (if supported) and then to provide the following types of prompts:
contents.zh-CHS: d. 能够对DTMF数字采集（如果支持）、语音记录（如果支持）、语音识别分析（如果支持）和/或语音验证/识别（如果支持）进行多个提示操作，然后提供以下类型的提示：

contents.text: - Initial Prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 初始提示

contents.text: - Reprompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 责备

contents.text: - Error prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 错误提示

contents.text: - Failure announcement
contents.zh-CHS: - 失败公告

contents.text: - Success announcement.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功公告。

contents.text: e. Allow the specification of definable key sequences for digit recording or speech recognition analysis (if supported) to:
contents.zh-CHS: e. 允许为数字记录或语音识别分析（如果支持）指定可定义的键序列：

contents.text: - Discard recording in progress, replay the prompt, and resume recording.
contents.zh-CHS: - 放弃正在进行的录制，重播提示，然后继续录制。

contents.text: - Discard recording in progress and resume recording.
contents.zh-CHS: - 放弃正在进行的录制并继续录制。

contents.text: - Terminate the current operation and return the terminating key sequence to the MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止当前操作并将终止键序列返回给MGC。

contents.text: f. Provide a way to ask the ARF MG to support the following definable keys for recording. These keys would then be able to be acted upon by the ARF MG:
contents.zh-CHS: f. 提供一种方法，要求ARF MG支持以下可定义的录制键。然后，ARF MG可以对这些键进行操作：

contents.text: - A key to terminate playing of an announcement in progress.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止正在播放的公告的键。

contents.text: - A key that signals the end of user input. The key may or may not be returned to the MGC along with the input already collected.
contents.zh-CHS: - 表示用户输入结束的键。密钥可能会也可能不会与已收集的输入一起返回给MGC。

contents.text: - Keys to stop playing the current announcement and resume playing at the beginning of the first segment of the announcement, last segment of the announcement, previous segment of the announcement, next segment of the announcement, or the current announcement segment.
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止播放当前公告并在公告的第一段、最后一段、上一段、下一段或当前公告段开始时继续播放的按键。

contents.text: g. While audio prompts are usually provisioned in IVR/ARF MGs, support changing the provisioned prompts in a voice session rather than a data session. In particular, with respect to audio management:
contents.zh-CHS: g. 虽然音频提示通常在IVR/ARF MGs中设置，但支持在语音会话而不是数据会话中更改设置的提示。特别是在音频管理方面：

contents.text: - A method to replace provisioned audio with audio recorded during a call. The newly recorded audio must be accessible using the identifier of the audio it replaces.
contents.zh-CHS: - 用呼叫期间录制的音频替换提供的音频的方法。新录制的音频必须使用其替换的音频的标识符进行访问。

contents.text: - A method to revert from replaced audio to the original provisioned audio.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将替换音频还原为原始配置音频的方法。

contents.text: - A method to take audio recorded during a call and store it such that it is accessible to the current call only through its own newly created unique identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一种方法，用于获取通话期间录制的音频并将其存储，以便当前通话只能通过其自己新创建的唯一标识符访问该音频。

contents.text: - A method to take audio recorded during a call and store it such that it is accessible to any subsequent call through its own newly created identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: - 一种方法，用于获取通话过程中录制的音频并将其存储，以便任何后续通话都可以通过其自己新创建的标识符访问该音频。

contents.text: 11.2.8.4. Speech Recognition Module
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.8.4. 语音识别模块

contents.text: The speech recognition module can be used for a number of speech recognition applications, such as:
contents.zh-CHS: 语音识别模块可用于多种语音识别应用，例如：

contents.text: - Limited Vocabulary Isolated Speech Recognition (e.g., "yes", "no", the number "four"),
contents.zh-CHS: - 词汇量有限的孤立语音识别（例如，“是”、“否”、数字“四”），

contents.text: - Limited Vocabulary Continuous Speech Feature Recognition (e.g., the utterance "four hundred twenty-three dollars"),and/or
contents.zh-CHS: - 词汇量有限的连续语音特征识别（例如，话语“423美元”），和/或

contents.text: - Continuous Speech Recognition (e.g., unconstrained speech recognition tasks).
contents.zh-CHS: - 连续语音识别（例如，无约束语音识别任务）。

contents.text: The Speech Recognition Module must support all of the requirements in the Play Module as in addition to the following requirements:
contents.zh-CHS: 除以下要求外，语音识别模块还必须支持播放模块中的所有要求：

contents.text: a. Be able to provide the following basic operation: request an AEG to play an announcement and then perform speech recognition analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 能够提供以下基本操作：请求AEG播放公告，然后执行语音识别分析。

contents.text: b. Be able to specify these event collection characteristics:
contents.zh-CHS: b. 能够指定以下事件集合特征：

contents.text: - The number of attempts to give to perform speech recognition task.
contents.zh-CHS: - 执行语音识别任务的尝试次数。

contents.text: c. With respect to speech recognition analysis timers, allow the specification of:
contents.zh-CHS: c. 对于语音识别分析计时器，允许指定：

contents.text: - Time to wait for the user to initially speak.
contents.zh-CHS: - 等待用户最初发言的时间。

contents.text: - The amount of silence necessary following the last speech segment for the speech recognition analysis segment to be considered complete.
contents.zh-CHS: - 最后一个语音段之后，语音识别分析段被视为完成所需的静音量。

contents.text: - The maximum allowable length of the speech recognition analysis (not including pre- and post- speech silence).
contents.zh-CHS: - 语音识别分析允许的最大长度（不包括语音前和语音后的静音）。

contents.text: d. To be able to allow multiple prompt operations for DTMF digit collection (if supported), voice recording (if supported), and/or speech recognition analysis and then to provide the following types of prompts:
contents.zh-CHS: d. 能够对DTMF数字采集（如果支持）、语音录制（如果支持）和/或语音识别分析进行多个提示操作，然后提供以下类型的提示：

contents.text: - Initial Prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 初始提示

contents.text: - Reprompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 责备

contents.text: - Error prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 错误提示

contents.text: - Failure announcement
contents.zh-CHS: - 失败公告

contents.text: - Success announcement.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功公告。

contents.text: e. Allow the specification of definable key sequences for digit recording (if supported) or speech recognition analysis to:
contents.zh-CHS: e. 允许为数字记录（如果支持）或语音识别分析指定可定义的键序列，以便：

contents.text: - Discard in process analysis, replay the prompt, and resume analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: - 放弃进程内分析，重播提示，然后继续分析。

contents.text: - Discard recording in progress and resume analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: - 放弃正在进行的记录并恢复分析。

contents.text: - Terminate the current operation and return the terminating key sequence to the MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止当前操作并将终止键序列返回给MGC。

contents.text: f. Provide a way to ask the ARF MG to support the following definable keys for speech recognition analysis. These keys would then be able to be acted upon by the ARF MG:
contents.zh-CHS: f. 提供一种方法，要求ARF MG支持以下用于语音识别分析的可定义键。然后，ARF MG可以对这些键进行操作：

contents.text: - A key to terminate playing of an announcement in progress.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止正在播放的公告的键。

contents.text: - A key that signals the end of user input. The key may or may not be returned to the MGC along with the input already collected.
contents.zh-CHS: - 表示用户输入结束的键。密钥可能会也可能不会与已收集的输入一起返回给MGC。

contents.text: - Keys to stop playing the current announcement and resume playing at the beginning of the first segment of the announcement, last segment of the announcement, previous segment of the announcement, next segment of the announcement, or the current announcement segment.
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止播放当前公告并在公告的第一段、最后一段、上一段、下一段或当前公告段开始时继续播放的按键。

contents.text: 11.2.8.5. Speaker Verification/Identification Module
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.8.5. 扬声器验证/识别模块

contents.text: The speech verification/identification module returns parameters that indicate either the likelihood of the speaker to be the person that they claim to be (verification task) or the likelihood of the speaker being one of the persons contained in a set of previously characterized speakers (identification task).
contents.zh-CHS: 语音验证/识别模块返回参数，这些参数指示说话人成为其声称的人的可能性（验证任务）或说话人成为包含在一组先前特征化的说话人中的人之一的可能性（识别任务）。

contents.text: The Speaker Verification/Identification Module must support all of the requirements in the Play Module in addition to the following requirements:
contents.zh-CHS: 除以下要求外，扬声器验证/识别模块必须支持播放模块中的所有要求：

contents.text: a. Be able to download parameters, such as speaker templates (verification task) or sets of potential speaker templates (identification task), either prior to the session or in mid-session.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 能够在会话之前或会话中期下载参数，如说话人模板（验证任务）或潜在说话人模板集（识别任务）。

contents.text: b. Be able to download application specific software to the ARF either prior to the session or in mid-session.
contents.zh-CHS: b. 能够在会话之前或会话中期将特定于应用程序的软件下载到ARF。

contents.text: c. Be able to return parameters indicating either the likelihood of the speaker to be the person that they claim to be (verification task) or the likelihood of the speaker being one of the persons contained in a set of previously characterized speakers (identification task).
contents.zh-CHS: c. 能够返回参数，指示说话人成为其声称的人的可能性（验证任务）或说话人成为一组先前具有特征的说话人中包含的人之一的可能性（识别任务）。

contents.text: d. Be able to provide the following basic operation: request an AEG to play an announcement and then perform speech verification/identification analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: d. 能够提供以下基本操作：请求AEG播放公告，然后执行语音验证/识别分析。

contents.text: e. Be able to specify these event collection characteristics: The number of attempts to give to perform speech verification/identification task.
contents.zh-CHS: e. 能够指定这些事件收集特征：执行语音验证/识别任务的尝试次数。

contents.text: f. With respect to speech verification/identification analysis timers, allow the specification of:
contents.zh-CHS: f. 关于语音验证/识别分析计时器，允许指定：

contents.text: - Time to wait for the user to initially speak.
contents.zh-CHS: - 等待用户最初发言的时间。

contents.text: - The amount of silence necessary following the last speech segment for the speech verification/identification analysis segment to be considered complete.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在最后一个语音段之后，语音验证/识别分析段被视为完成所需的静音量。

contents.text: - The maximum allowable length of the speech verification/identification analysis (not including pre- and post- speech silence).
contents.zh-CHS: - 语音验证/识别分析的最大允许长度（不包括演讲前和演讲后的沉默）。

contents.text: g. To be able to allow multiple prompt operations for DTMF digit collection (if supported), voice recording, (if supported), speech recognition analysis (if supported) and/or speech verification/identification and provide the following types of prompts:
contents.zh-CHS: g. 能够对DTMF数字采集（如果支持）、语音记录（如果支持）、语音识别分析（如果支持）和/或语音验证/识别进行多个提示操作，并提供以下类型的提示：

contents.text: - Initial Prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 初始提示

contents.text: - Reprompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 责备

contents.text: - Error prompt
contents.zh-CHS: - 错误提示

contents.text: - Failure announcement
contents.zh-CHS: - 失败公告

contents.text: - Success announcement.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功公告。

contents.text: h. Allow the specification of definable key sequences for digit recording (if supported) or speech recognition (if supported) in the speech verification/identification analysis to:
contents.zh-CHS: h. 允许在语音验证/识别分析中为数字记录（如果支持）或语音识别（如果支持）指定可定义的键序列，以便：

contents.text: - Discard speech verification/identification in analysis, replay the prompt, and resume analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在分析中放弃语音验证/识别，重放提示，然后继续分析。

contents.text: - Discard speech verification/identification analysis in progress and resume analysis.
contents.zh-CHS: - 放弃正在进行的语音验证/识别分析和恢复分析。

contents.text: - Terminate the current operation and return the terminating key sequence to the MGC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止当前操作并将终止键序列返回给MGC。

contents.text: i. Provide a way to ask the ARF MG to support the following definable keys for speech verification/identification analysis. These keys would then be able to be acted upon by the ARF MG:
contents.zh-CHS: i. 提供一种方法，要求ARF MG支持以下用于语音验证/识别分析的可定义密钥。然后，ARF MG可以对这些键进行操作：

contents.text: - A key to terminate playing of an announcement in progress.
contents.zh-CHS: - 终止正在播放的公告的键。

contents.text: - A key that signals the end of user input. The key may or may not be returned to the MGC along with the input already collected.
contents.zh-CHS: - 表示用户输入结束的键。密钥可能会也可能不会与已收集的输入一起返回给MGC。

contents.text: - Keys to stop playing the current announcement and resume speech verification/identification at the beginning of the first segment of the announcement, last segment of the announcement, previous segment of the announcement, next segment of the announcement, or the current announcement segment.
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止播放当前公告并在公告的第一段、最后一段、前一段、下一段或当前公告段开始时恢复语音验证/识别的按键。

contents.text: 11.2.8.6. Auditory Feature Extraction/Recognition Module
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.8.6. 听觉特征提取/识别模块

contents.text: The auditory feature extraction/recognition module is engineered to continuously monitor the auditory stream for the appearance of particular auditory signals or speech utterances of interest and to report these events (and optionally a signal feature representation of these events) to network servers or MGCs.
contents.zh-CHS: 听觉特征提取/识别模块被设计成连续监测听觉流中特定听觉信号或感兴趣语音的出现，并向网络服务器或MGC报告这些事件（以及可选的这些事件的信号特征表示）。

contents.text: The Auditory Feature Extraction/Recognition Module must support the following requirements:
contents.zh-CHS: 听觉特征提取/识别模块必须支持以下要求：

contents.text: a. Be able to download application specific software to the ARF either prior to the session or in mid-session.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 能够在会话之前或会话中期将特定于应用程序的软件下载到ARF。

contents.text: b. Be able to download parameters, such as a representation of the auditory feature to extract/recognize, for prior to the session or in mid-session.
contents.zh-CHS: b. 能够在会话之前或会话中期下载参数，例如要提取/识别的听觉特征的表示。

contents.text: c. Be able to return parameters indicating the auditory event found or a representation of the feature found (i.e., auditory feature).
contents.zh-CHS: c. 能够返回指示所发现听觉事件或所发现特征（即听觉特征）表示的参数。

contents.text: 11.2.8.7. Audio Conferencing Module
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.8.7. 音频会议模块

contents.text: The protocol must support:
contents.zh-CHS: 该议定书必须支持：

contents.text: a. a mechanism to create multi-point conferences of audio only and multimedia conferences in the MG.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 在MG中创建仅音频会议和多媒体会议的多点会议的机制。

contents.text: b. audio mixing; mixing multiple audio streams into a new composite audio stream
contents.zh-CHS: b. 音频混音；将多个音频流混合到新的合成音频流中

contents.text: c. audio switching; selection of incoming audio stream to be sent out to all conference participants.
contents.zh-CHS: c. 音频交换；选择要发送给所有会议参与者的传入音频流。

contents.text: 11.2.9. Multipoint Control Units
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.9. 多点控制单元

contents.text: The protocol must support:
contents.zh-CHS: 该议定书必须支持：

contents.text: a. a mechanism to create multi-point conferences of audio only and multimedia conferences in the MG.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 在MG中创建仅音频会议和多媒体会议的多点会议的机制。

contents.text: b. audio mixing; mixing multiple audio streams into a new composite audio stream
contents.zh-CHS: b. 音频混音；将多个音频流混合到新的合成音频流中

contents.text: c. audio switching; selection of incoming audio stream to be sent out to all conference participants.
contents.zh-CHS: c. 音频交换；选择要发送给所有会议参与者的传入音频流。

contents.text: d. video switching; selection of video stream to be sent out to all conference participants
contents.zh-CHS: d. 视频交换；选择要发送给所有会议参与者的视频流

contents.text: e. lecture video mode; a video selection option where on video source is sent out to all conference users
contents.zh-CHS: e. 讲座视频模式；一个视频选择选项，其中视频源发送给所有会议用户

contents.text: f. multi-point of T.120 data conferencing.
contents.zh-CHS: f. 多点T.120数据会议。

contents.text: g. The ability for the MG to function as an H.323 MP, and for the MGC to function as an H.323 MC, connected by this protocol (MEGACOP/H.248). It should be possible for audio, data, and video MG/MPs to be physically separate while being under the control of a single MGC/H.323 MC.
contents.zh-CHS: g. MG作为H.323 MP运行的能力，以及MGC作为H.323 MC运行的能力，通过此协议连接（MEGACOP/H.248）。在单个MGC/H.323 MC的控制下，音频、数据和视频MG/MPs应该可以物理分离。
